name: Fish Game (kotz_fresse)
description:
This is Fish Game. Me and two friends made it for the SEAJAM Gamejam. It is a Gamejam for MrBeasts and Marc Robers #TeamSeas Projekt where you can donat money to remove plastic from the ocean.

Click away the plastic and try to safe the fish as long as you can. 

Also you might have to reload a level a couple of times if there is way to much plastic at the beginning. Sorry for that but I don't know how to fix it right now. 

~~~~~Controlls~~~~~

Take your mouse and move it.

When you see plastic go click click to remove it.

When you click click fish you kill fish. So don't do that.
